channel.title: Comunistando — Feed Geral
channel.description: Breaking News do mundo socialista (feed geral)

item.title: Education, health fees among key concerns
item.description: China to legislate on preschool education

item.title: Education, health fees among key concerns
item.description: China to legislate on preschool education

item.title: International group praises green revival
item.description: A high-level international advisory body applauded China's efforts to improve the environment and suggested a 15-year strategy against pollution in a draft recommendation report on Monday.

item.title: Russia Says Captured Two Villages in Ukraine’s Donetsk Region
item.description: Russian forces are slowly advancing in the embattled eastern region, grinding closer to Kyiv's key defensive line in costly meter-for-meter battles.

item.title: Krasnodar Court Freezes Bank Accounts of Companies Linked to Black Sea Oil Spill
item.description: Rosprirodnadzor is seeking $614 million in damages from the two companies over the December 2024 oil spill off the coast of the Krasnodar region.

item.title: Russia Delays Moon and Venus Missions Again
item.description: Luna-26 is planned to launch in 2028, while the Venus mission, previously rescheduled for the 2034-35 window, will now slip to 2036.

item.title: Sudáfrica enviará misión comercial hacia Nigeria y Ghana
item.description: Pretoria, 23 ago (Prensa Latina) El ministerio de Comercio, Industria y Competencia (dtic) de Sudáfrica encabezará del 25 al 29 de agosto una misión de promoción de exportaciones e inversiones a Nigeria y Ghana, The post Sudáfrica enviará misión comercial haci

item.title: Debates parlamentarios sobre Presupuesto 2026 signan semana panameña
item.description: Cuidad de Panamá, 23 ago (Prensa Latina) El inicio de los debates parlamentarios sobre el Presupuesto de la Nación para la vigencia fiscal 2026 signaron la semana que concluye hoy en Panamá. The post Debates parlamentarios sobre Presupuesto 2026 signan semana

item.title: Siria desmiente firma de pacto de seguridad con Israel en septiembre
item.description: Damasco, 23 ago (Prensa Latina) El Ministerio de Asuntos Exteriores de Siria negó hoy informaciones difundidas sobre la supuesta firma de un acuerdo de seguridad entre Damasco y Tel Aviv, prevista para el próximo 25 de septiembre. The post Siria desmiente firm

item.title: Lao Foreign Minister Pays Courtesy Call on Mongolian Prime Minister
item.description: (KPL) As part of his official visit to Mongolia and participation in the 10th Foreign Ministers’ Meeting of the Forum for East Asia–Latin America Cooperation (FEALAC) on August 21, Foreign Minister of the Lao PDR Thongsavanh Phomvihane and his delegation paid
